org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel
Class AeRPCEncodedSerializer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.axis.encoding.ser.ElementSerializer
      org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel.AeRPCEncodedSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.apache.axis.encoding.Serializer, javax.xml.rpc.encoding.Serializer
public class AeRPCEncodedSerializer
extends org.apache.axis.encoding.ser.ElementSerializer

Custom serializer for axis that handles complex types over rpc. The base class, ElementSerializer wasn't handling checking to see if we were encoding the types via multiRef.

See Also:

Field Detail

TYPE_PREFIX

public static final java.lang.String TYPE_PREFIX
prefix used when setting the xsi:type on the serialized multiRef element. The AeLiteralDeserializer will skip over namespace declaration with this prefix to avoid the namespace declaration getting propagated when it's not needed.

See Also:
